fortuneDeck.name: Fortune Deck
fortuneDeck.hint: [Host only] The cards deck which represents the Fortune Deck.

sorceryDeck.name: Sorcery Deck
sorceryDeck.hint: [Host only] The cards deck which represents the Sorcery Deck.

sorceryAbility.name: Name of the Sorcery ability
sorceryAbility.hint: [Host only] [Optional] Allows to have character ability names in the language spoken by your group, even if this language is not officially supporte by the system yet.

damageSystem.name: Damage system
damageSystem.hint: [Host only] You may select the type of damage you wish to display in sheets, forms and chat messages.
damageSystem.wounds: Wounds (original system depicted in the corebook)
damageSystem.harmRank: Harm Rank (alternative system depicted in Comme Il Faut)

divorceVariation.name: The Divorce Variation
divorceVariation.hint: [Host only] In which Abilities loosen the bonds which hold them tight to their governing Suits.

cardsUi.name: Cards User Interface
cardsUi.hint: You may select your preferred user interface for cards here.

cardWidth.name: Cards width
cardWidth.hint: If you use the Default cards user interface, you may select your preferred size for cards here (default: 200). (If you chose the ðŸ¦‹ Monarch interface, the see Monarch module settings instead.)

notifications.babeleInstallRequired: The Babele module is not installed! Install and activate it in order for Compendiums to be translated.
notifications.babeleActivationRequired: The Babele module is installed, but it is not active! Activate it in order for Compendiums to be translated.
notifications.macroForOwnedItems: You can only create macro buttons for owned Items.
notifications.abilityInvalidSuit: The suit associated to the ability is invalid.
notifications.spellInvalidAspect: The aspect associated to the spell is invalid.
notifications.noFortuneHandForFeat: No Fortune Hand to perform feat with.
notifications.noSorceryHandForSpell: No Sorcery Hand to cast spell with.
notifications.spellAlreadyBeingCast: Spell is already being cast. Cancel it from the Sorcery Hand if you wish to cast another.
notifications.noItemNamed: Your controlled character does not have an item of type '{type}' named '{name}'.
notifications.deckNotFound: It appears a deck is missing. Suggest to your Host they verify Fortune and Sorcery Decks as well as system settings.
notifications.cannotDraw: There are no available cards left in the deck. Cannot draw any.
notifications.incompleteDraw: There are no available cards left in the deck. Only {nb1} cards out of {nb2} could be drawn.
notifications.lastCardDrawn: There are no available cards left in the deck. The last card was just drawn.

notEnoughPowerGathered.description1: You do not appear to have gathered enough power yet.

performFeatHandRefill.description1: Your Fortune Hand contains only {nb} cards.
performFeatHandRefill.description2: Would you like to refill it?

weapon.concealPocket: P - Pockets, Pants Leg or Sleeve

complexity.label: Elements & Tasks
complexity.b: Spell involves only a few elements
complexity.e: Subject must perform only one Task

nbSubjects.label: Number of Subjects Affected
nbSubjects.b: Up to 10 people, or 10 sq. feet
nbSubjects.c: Up to 100 people, or 100 sq. feet
nbSubjects.d: Up to 1000 people, or 1000 sq. feet
